a: We partner with operators running $2M-$20M revenue businesses who can dedicate an executive sponsor. Acceptance hovers around 30% to keep teams focused.
Typically 6–9 months. We stay through rollout, training, and stabilization so your operators are confident owning the automations.
Engagements begin at $18K and flex with scope. Our teams plug into your tools—no hidden software costs.
You’ll pair with a Meadow partner and a field engineer embedded in your workflows. We also coordinate with finance and ops stakeholders weekly.
We document every automation, create runbooks, and train your team. Our process stepper receipts ensure nothing is lost in transition.
